Texts.Chs: 谢谢你，你真是个好人！给你这个，只有它才能表达我对你的感激之情！
Texts.Eng: Awesome. You are good people. As a thanks, have a contract that summons some most assuredly ^red;not^reset; good people!

Texts.Chs: 在一个醉酒派对中，凯文尿在了我的^orange;水培托盘^reset;上，把它弄坏了！我没有^orange;能源设备制造器^reset;来制造新的...你能拿一个给我吗？
Texts.Eng: Kevin urinated on my ^orange;Hydroponics Tray^reset; during a drunken staff party and broke it! I don't have a ^orange;Power Station^reset; to craft a new one... could you bring one to me?
